name: Markus Heer
what_is_my_connection_to_javascript: I'm a Frontend Developer who is always interested in new Javascript knowledge. Currently working on a project with Vue.js, but also did React, Angular and Vanilla JS in the past projects.
what_can_i_contribute: I love to participate in good conversations about everything in the JS ecosystem, if there is something i can contribute to, i won't hesitate to give a small Tutorial session on something :)
